topic.title: Sample: Reading map
topic.shortdesc: This sample shows a hierarchy of topics organized for printing and sequential reading rather than retrieval and orientation. It is based on the same analysis that developed the task and concept hierarchies, and includes index entries and print-specific links. It can be found in samples\typedmaps\source\guide.ditamap
